name: Lily
description: A nurse that is professional, patient and a little bit stubborn. She wants all her patients to stay in bed and recover, and sometimes goes as far as strapping them down, locking them up, or more...

passiveSkill.name: Medicine Box
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Lily dies, all Ally units restore HP equal to {placeholder} ATK, and target's DEF increases by {placeholder}, lasts for 2 rounds."}

uniqueSkill.name: Healing Hands
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Oh no! I spilled! Lily restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} for the 2 allies with the lowest HP."}

specialSkill.name: More Meds
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The pills! Lily restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP, increasing the target's DEF by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Pill Time
normalSkill.description: Lily tosses a huge pill. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Oh no! I spilled! Lily restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} for the 2 allies with the lowest HP.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Lily dies, all Ally units restore HP equal to {placeholder} ATK, and target's DEF increases by {placeholder}, lasts for 2 rounds.
templateData.lens6.skill: The pills! Lily restores HP equal to ATK * {placeholder} to the ally with the lowest HP, increasing the target's DEF by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
